Name: Jane's Group
description:
Jane's Group is formed by 8 farmers in Webuye District and is being represented by Jane, who is the group leader pictured above. She is 40 years old and has 6 children. Jane has been a farmer for more than 20 years and is often referred to as a very hardworking individual.

Jane isnâ€™t new to One Acre Fund, she actually joined the program in 2013 and has since noticed her life has changed; especially in the sense that she has had a healthier life due to better nutrition ever since. This year, Jane will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of her loan, but will also purchase a solar light. She is very excited about this addition since now she will be able to have an overall improved quality of life.

Using this loan, Jane's Group will purchase a total of 6 solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 2.5 acres.
